FAQ / Starter Packs /

Bumblebee vs Megatron Starter Set

  1. Which card sets are permitted in Constructed tournaments?
    Wave 1: Transformers TCG Booster Packs
    • Convention Pack 2018
    • Autobot Starter Set
    • Metroplex Deck
    • Convention Edition 2018
    Wave 2: Rise of the Combiners
    • Devastator Deck
    • Bumblebee vs Megatron Starter Set
    Wave 3: War for Cybertron: Siege I
    • Convention Pack 2019
    Blaster vs Soundwave (35th Anniversary Edition)
    Blaster vs Soundwave (Retail Edition)
    Wave 4: War for Cybertron: Siege II
    Wave One Energon Edition (Character and Battle Cards)
  2. What battle cards are in the Bumblebee vs Megatron Starter Set?
    2 x Primary Laser
    2 x Armored Plating
    2 x Handheld Blaster
    2 x Improvised Shield
    2 x Enforcement Batons
    2 x Security Console
    2 x Backup Beam
    2 x Grenade Launcher
    2 x Sparring Gear
    2 x Stealthiness
    2 x Vaporize
    2 x New Designs
    2 x Surprise Attack
    2 x Rest and Relaxation
    2 x Supercharge
    2 x Reckless Charge
    2 x Pep Talk
    2 x Equipment Enthusiast
    2 x Inferno Breath
    1 x Leap of Faith
    1 x Strafing Run
